alert.note: Alert for Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 11 at 10:10AM EST until March 20 at 8:43AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Indiana... Illinois... Wabash River at New Harmony. .Recent heavy rain will result in a secondary rise along the Wabash River at New Harmony. River levels are forecast to crest in the minor flooding range next week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY, MARCH 20... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at New Harmony. * WHEN...Until Sunday, March 20. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CST Friday the stage was 16.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.0 feet Wednesday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday, March 20. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
